summary: Diff updates Dashboard header UI to show a "Tayari" title and uses an AvatarImage pointing to /assets/generated/psc-profile.dim_512x512.png, but no new static image asset was added and there’s no clear evidence that the exact phrase "design by build tayari" was removed everywhere it appears.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the top profile/header screen text so that anywhere the app currently shows the phrase "design by build tayari" it instead shows exactly "Tayari" (and does not include any other words around it).
missing_requirements.reason: Only Dashboard.tsx is shown changing/using "Tayari"; the diff summary provides no evidence that the literal string "design by build tayari" was located and removed/replaced across the app UI.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (no mention of replacing "design by build tayari" globally)

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a profile image on the profile/header area that visually looks like someone preparing for PSC, and ensure it is displayed as the profile avatar/image in that profile area (with sensible cropping such as a circle or rounded avatar).
missing_requirements.reason: No new image asset was added under frontend/public/assets/generated (ADDED FILES: none). Although the Dashboard references /assets/generated/psc-profile.dim_512x512.png, the asset itself is not present in the diff summary.
evidence: File diff summary: ADDED FILES: none

missing_requirements.requirement: Wire the newly generated PSC-preparation profile image asset as a static frontend asset (do not fetch it from the backend), and reference it via a stable /assets/generated/... path from the profile UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The stable /assets/generated/... reference is present, but the required newly generated static asset itself was not added in the diff (no file under frontend/public/assets/generated shown as added).
evidence: File diff summary: ADDED FILES: none

hallucinated_features.description: Dashboard header was modified to include a profile avatar next to AppLogo and a gradient-styled "Tayari" title.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on the profile/header area text and adding a PSC-preparation profile image; it also states a non-goal to avoid changing dashboard header branding beyond what’s necessary. The diff shows changes specifically in the dashboard header (Dashboard.tsx), which may be outside the requested profile/header area.
